body:
Comment 22 by **aidanphs**: 
I've been working on reducing the (intermittent) reproduction case (namely stripping
down lib/pq) and saw the below error message. I've only ever seen it once in the tens of
thousands (maybe hundreds) of times running the program but it looked sufficiently
interesting to note here.
This was the only output from the program. GOTRACEBACK=2 was exported at the time.
====

runtime: panic before malloc heap initialized
fatal error: runtime: cannot allocate heap metadata
